[Portrait]Delita[Dialog]
Your pace has slowed. Are you weary?

We'll never make Zeltennia at this rate.{END}

[Portrait]Ovelia[Dialog]
Arriving sooner will no more make me
a princess than arriving later.{END}

That day you saved me at these falls
seems so distant now.

Your promise to cut me free from the
strings of those who manipulate me-it
was an empty one, wasn't it?{END}

Empty or no, you've no choice but to follow me.


The hounds are loosed. No bolt-hole is left to
you. Run, and you'll still be hunted down as the
princess who stands in the way of the throne.{END}

Why must you say such things!?{END}

Ah-!{END}

[Portrait]Northern Sky Scout[Dialog]
Hmph. I'd not thought to find the
lady princess here.
That thrice-be-damned Gaffgarion must
have failed yet again. The man is naught
but boasts and swagger.{END}

Our orders are to kill on sight. The
princess does not leave this place!{END}

Fools! If it is your wish to die here,
then so be it!{END}

[Portrait]Ovelia[Dialog]
O Father... Abandon not your...your
wayward children...{END}

[Portrait]Delita[Dialog]
Was that enough to lift the gauze
from your eyes?
Bathe the earth in bitter tears, and it
will still be all too content to drink
your blood.
Bemoan your fate and wait for it to
claim you, or take my hand and live.
The choice is yours.{END}

[Portrait]Ovelia[Dialog]
It appears...I have no choice.{END}
